metadata.name: SYSTEM TRAPS
metadata.description: "System Traps" is an evocative artwork that captures the disorienting and endless nature of a game, imbued with ritualistic symbols of social status and greatness. The multi-layered symbols utilized in the artwork allows for a diverse range of interpretations and encourages critical engagement. In essence, the artwork serves as a compelling reflection on the delicate balance between rules and play in the complex game of life.
